b: ^Violet: Hey! I haven’t seen you around before. Are you new here?
^Sunny: Yeah! I’m Sunny, and I’m here with my gremlin
^Sunny: This is gonna be my first real race. I’m pumped!
^Violet: First real race, huh? That’s so cool! I wish I could experience my first race all over again, it was so exciting!
^Violet: Oh! I forgot to introduce myself. I’m Violet, and this is my gremlin Jellybeans.
^Violet: Alright. Gremlin races are split into four sections- Running, Climbing, Swimming, and Flying.
^Violet: Your Gremlin will know what to do in each section, so all you have to do is cheer them on.
^Violet: Cheering your gremlin on will help them push their limits and go even faster!
^Violet: At least, Jellybeans runs faster when I cheer.
^Sunny: All right! I’ll cheer my heart out. Let’s have fun in this race!
^Violet: Sunny! Glad to see you again! So, how are you feeling after your first real race?
^Sunny: Great! I’ll admit I was really nervous, but once I saw how much fun
^ was having, I couldn’t help but have fun too.
^Violet: Yeah! Our gremlins really give it their all in those races, so it’s important to support them in any way we can!
^Violet: Jellybeans and I have been racing together for a while now, but we had to work hard to build the bond we have.
^Violet: We weren’t that close at first, but then we noticed both of us had a habit of working ourselves too hard.
^Violet: Somehow, we ended up bonding over that.
^Sunny: That’s amazing! I hope that I can have that kind of bond with
^Sunny: I’ll admit, I feel like I’m not being the best parent to my gremlins as I can. I feel like I’m lacking as a Grom.
^Violet: If you love and care for your gremlin, there's no wrong way to be a Grom.
^Violet: C’mon! The race is about to start, and
^ is counting on you to cheer them on!
^Sunny: Yeah! I won’t let them down!
^Violet: Ready for the next race Sunny?
^ and I have been working hard together and I think it’ll pay off! How about you and Jellybeans?
^Violet: Ready as we’ll ever be! We just got our daily run in, and we’ve been honing our flying skills! After this race I think we’ll do some long distance swimming practice!
^Sunny: Oh wow, the both of you?
^Violet: Hm? You don’t work out with your gremlin as well?
^Sunny: Well, other than going on some runs with
^Sunny: I didn’t know I had to train with my gremlins too.
^Violet: That’s alright! Everybody has a different way of training with their gremlin.
^Violet: I only do it this way because I used to be a runner. I’ve even made this spreadsheet to track our progress.
^Violet: Jellybeans really likes these. He’ll sometimes stare at these for hours.
^Sunny: Huh… You really do share a deep bond with your gremlin. I’m a little jealous.
^Sunny: But that won’t stop me and
^ We’re going to give it our all!
^Violet: Good! We like a little challenge!
^Sunny: Alright… This is it, Sunny. The biggest race on the island.
^Violet: You okay, Sunny? You look nervous.
^Sunny: Oh! I didn’t notice you there. Yeah, I’m a little worried about this race… It’s just so big.
^Violet: Well, you should try not to fidget around so much. It might make
^Violet: It happens. Jellybeans here is especially good at telling when I’m nervous.
^Violet: He’s actually pretty good at taking care of others; a bunch of gremlins follow him around all the time.
^Violet: I think they voted him as their President or something.
^Sunny: Haha, I didn’t know you told jokes this funny, Violet.
^Sunny: Oh! That’s the starting announcement. Gotta go!
^Sunny: Hi, Violet! Nice day to race, huh?
^Violet: Yep! A nice cool breeze like this makes me want to go for a run, too.
^Sunny: Yeah! It’s perfect for getting fired up. Let’s go,
^Sunny: Hi, Violet! Hi, Jellybeans! Great too see you again.
^Sunny: Great! Good enough to bring the fight to Jellybeans!
^Violet: I’d rather you not, he has a lot on his plate already.
^Sunny: Oh, sorry. It’s just a saying. Anyways, let’s race!
^Violet: Heya, Sunny. We’re running into each other a lot, huh?
^Sunny: Yeah. I’m starting to really like racing now.
^Violet: I can tell. I don’t really know any other trainer that has as many gremlins racing as you do.
^Violet: Why do you race with so many gremlins, anyways?
^Sunny: Because my dream is to be
^Violet: Well, good luck. Both on your dream, and in this race.
